keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

headline.print_headline: Vivian Stromberg, 74; Worked to Aid Women
headline.main: Vivian Stromberg, Who Worked to Aid Women, Dies at 74

snippet: Ms. Stromberg, who taught elementary school in the South Bronx in the early 1980s, helped create Madre, an aid and human rights organization that supported women’s groups around the world.
abstract: Vivian Stromberg, founding member and executive director of human rights organization Madre, which provides aid to local and international women's groups in effort to alleviate suffering caused by war and natural disasters, dies at age 74.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Stromberg, who taught elementary school in the South Bronx in the early 1980s, helped create Madre, an aid and human rights organization that supported women’s groups around the world.
